actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A bill to direct the deduction of amounts appropriated pursuant to the Indochina Migration and Refugee Assistance Act of 1975, from the U.S. annual assessed share of the budget of the United Nations.

summary.text: Requires the deduction of amounts appropriated pursuant to the Indochina Migration and Refugee Assistance Act of 1975 from the United States annual assessed share of the budget of the United Nations.

titles.title: A bill to direct the deduction of amounts appropriated pursuant to the Indochina Migration and Refugee Assistance Act of 1975, from the U.S. annual assessed share of the budget of the United Nations.
